text:
@SenSchumer Time to put the brakes on the Covid-19 bills.

Did you ever hear of a DEFICIT?

Time to see where the country stands after the first several weeks of the reopening of the country.

Also,the rest of the country does NOT want to bailout the mismanagement of YOUR state!

Just sayin
